Introduction
------------

Implementation of the `Blake2` precompiled contract.


.. only:: stage1

Module Details
---------------

blake2f
~~~~~~~


.. function:: blake2f(evm: ethereum.shanghai.vm.Evm) -> None
   :noindexentry:

   Writes the Blake2 hash to output.

   :param evm: The current EVM frame.
